title: [1.10.2][Kaishi's Weapon Pack kaishi的武器包] 还在用单一的剑吗？不想看看其他武器
author: x794815255
txt_content:
本帖最后由 x794815255 于 2016-8-20 11:19 编辑 
版主看的废话版规说不能放单版本mod 但是原帖只有1.9.4 1.10.2的版本 然而1.9.4与1.10.2有很大区别（完全不同）1.9.4只是bate版本 所以有好多武器都没有 所以我只搬了1.10.2版本 希望不要删帖警告

lz的废话（很重要 不看后悔）
我也没什么好说的
不过配合武器等级mod食用味道更佳@莫念伤

英语好的看这里

Melee Weapons:Dragonslayer (Berserk's Sword):-Extreme attack damage;-Very slow attack speed;-Extreme range of attack (+2 blocks);-Unbreakable;-3 stages of upgrades;-Strictly two-handed! Doesn't deal any damage when your offhand isn't empty.Washing Pole (Dark Souls II/III):-Higher attack damage;-Slower attack speed;-Long range of attack (+1.5 blocks);-Fragile (131 uses, like stone tools);Cactus Sword:-Wooden Sword's durability;-Iron sword's damage;Greatswords:-High attack damage;-Slow attack speed;-Longer range of attack (+0.5 blocks);-Universal weapon! Attacks 20% slower when offhand isn't empty, so it's still usable with shield.Black Greatsword (Guts' Golden Age sword):-Stronger than iron greatsword, but weaker than diamond one;-As durable as the Diamond Greatsword;-Universal weapon! Attacks 20% slower when offhand isn't empty, so it's still usable with shield.Zweihanders:-Stronger than greatswords;-Slower than greatswords;-Longer range of attack (+1.0 blocks);-Two-handed weapon! Attacks 60% slower when offhand isn't empty.Claws:-Very low damage;-Very high attack speed;-Zombie Hand - variation of Iron Claws (Terraria, yay!);Battle Axes:-Very high attack damage (higher, than axes');-Very low attack speed (slower than axes);-Can chop trees, etc.;Katanas:-Lower attack damage (a bit lower, than swords');-Higher attack speed (faster, than swords);-Works in the same way as swords (the same enchantments, sweep attacks);Spears:-Lower attack damage;-Sword's attack speed;-Longer range of attack (+1.5 blocks);Lances:     -IN PROGRESS-High attack damage;-Low attack speed;-Longer range of attack (+2.0 blocks);-Perfect for cavalry;


自己的解说 没英语的详细（一点都不详细）
武器/材质*伤害 木 石 铁 金 钻石 攻速  爪 2.53 3.5 2.5 4  2.8 武士刀 3.254 4.75 3.25 5.5  2.2巨剑 5.57 8.5  5.5 101.36大剑7.69.8 12 7.614.21 矛3.254 4.75 3.25 5.5 1.6战斧7.58.59.5 7.510.5 0.8 
还有其他武器（伤害&攻速） 黑色恐惧9.25  1.36 恐惧屠龙 15 0.76 恐惧屠龙者 22.5 0.76 觉醒屠龙者 30 0.76 强化武士刀 7 1.36  仙人掌剑 5.5 1.6 僵尸爪 3.5 2.8合成表就不添加了 自己nei吧（其实是lz不愿意加nei）




图片 总览 
左手大剑 右手巨剑 

爪



黑色恐惧和屠龙者

战斧僵尸爪

仙人掌剑

 战斧可以当普通斧头用


下载地址 上面没有嘛对了 谁测试一下能不能
兼容1.9.4版本
回复在下面 
还有 任何屠龙系列刀攻击会变成红紫块（就是找不到模型的那种样子）不知道是我这边mod问题还是他本质原因

鉴于还是有人找不到下载地址

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 流年在了 于 2016-12-23 20:40 编辑 

屠龙的武丢失模型应该跟一个叫等级系统的mod有关，删除等级系统mod就没事了还有就是屠龙的武器好像不能附魔，有点坑
